summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Rainier Avenue from Angeline Street to Hudson Street; by the installation of a street lighting system; and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8174 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
